name: Hachi Shiki
description: The boss of the izakaya looks like a fifteen-year-old girl. She likes to drink under the moon and cherishes peace and joy in the world. Her bark is worse than her bite. She's down-to-earth, appreciates practicality, and is always true to her word.

passiveSkill.name: Drunken Stupor
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Hachi Shiki is stunned, increases your DMG RES Rate by 50%. Team Skill: Hachi Shiki goes to battle.Triggered Effect: Hachi Shiki is like a Nightmare to Rie. When the two are in the same team, reduces Rie's DMG Rate and DMG RES Rate by 80%."}

uniqueSkill.name: Drunk Snake Dance
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Deals DMG equal to ATK * {placeholder} to 3 random enemies. Reduces the target's DMG RES Rate by 20%. Lasts the whole round and cannot be stacked, and has a 60% chance to trigger Enrage, increasing DMG by 100%, and stunning the target for 1 round. After triggering Enrage, you will be weak and Stunned for 1 round."}

specialSkill.name: Ghost Break
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Deals DMG equal to ATK * {placeholder} to an enemy. Increases your CRIT Rate by 20%. Skill release rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: One Blade
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Deals DMG equal to ATK * {placeholder} to 3 random enemies. Reduces the target's DMG RES Rate by 20%. Lasts the whole round and cannot be stacked, and has a 60% chance to trigger Enrage, increasing DMG by 100%, and stunning the target for 1 round. After triggering Enrage, you will be weak and Stunned for 1 round.

templateData.lens6.skill: Deals DMG equal to ATK * {placeholder} to an enemy. Increases your CRIT Rate by 20%. Skill release rate: {placeholder}
